Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: Well, you could buy a bit and keep some dry powder.  @darkistto   Sort of dollar cost average this trough

Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: i am wrestling with the same question.  But ultimately, if we see another bull run, it won't matter much if you bought this dip at $0.64 (current price) or $0.50.  You will have bought and you will be profiting orders of magnitude more than the average Joe who owns no crypto.

Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: Timing bottoms is frigging hard though, especially if the market is manipulated.  So, not financial advice, and I am not a professional, but you might consider buying a bit now but keeping plenty of fiat on the sidelines.  If it dips again, you can buy more and if come January ETF's are launched and it looks like we are transitioning to a bull market, you will still be able to buy sub $1 KMD on the way back up.
